name: System Console ➜ Group Configuration -  UI: Channel admin role can be set and saved

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
System Console ➜ Group Configuration - UI: Channel admin role can be set and saved
————————————————————————————
  1. Configure AD/LDAP and enable LDAP Group Sync and ensure there are LDAP Groups available.
  2. Go to System Console ➜ Groups Page and click on one of the groups.
  3. Click on Add a Channel and select a Channel.
  4. Check if there is an option provided to Assign a role to the channel.
inline.expectedResult: • Assigned Roles column should have dropdown options of Member and Channel Admin.

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Epic) Group Sync to Roles for AD/LDAP — MM-19111

inline.description: 1. Change the dropdown values and save. Reload the page and check if values are saved.
inline.expectedResult: • The values changes in the Assigned Roles dropdown should persist even after the page reload.
